title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 December 2011 - XWiki
content:
11:03 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
12:07 <vmassol> sdumitriu: good morning, fyi search is still returning all results for me, but maybe that's because we need to update the XR app on xwiki.org  
13:31 <vmassol> sdumitriu: try searching for "pan"  
14:10 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:24 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r171721d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-xwiki-server-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/xwiki/internal/ExtensionUpdaterListener.java : Save with minor edit + improved save comment - http://git.io/\_XCJ5w  
15:58 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rc2e3501 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XRENDERING-165: Offer extension point to store extra context information in the Link Checker link states cache ...
